data.title: Easy Listening sub-genres
data.meta_description: Lately I'm getting more and more into easy listening, but I can't really dig the difference between its sub-genres. Well, Exotica is actually pretty...
data.text:
Lately I'm getting more and more into easy listening, but I can't really dig the difference between its sub-genres. Well, Exotica is actually pretty self explanatory, but how do you identify Lounge and Space Age Pop?

Also, I believe those three sub-genres do not encompass the entire range of easy listening and I wonder if there are other well established tags to describe different shades of this very broad genre.
